description: Detects potential registry persistence technique using the Event Viewer "Events.asp" technique
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potential Persistence Via Event Viewer Events.asp
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Event\ Viewer\\MicrosoftRedirectionProgram* OR *\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Event\ Viewer\\MicrosoftRedirectionURL*) AND (NOT (((process.executable.text:"*C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\svchost.exe" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Event\ Viewer\\MicrosoftRedirectionProgram AND winlog.event_data.Details:"%%SystemRoot%%\PCHealth\HelpCtr\Binaries\HelpCtr.exe")) OR ((process.executable.text:"*C\:\\WINDOWS\\system32\\svchost.exe" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Event\ Viewer\\MicrosoftRedirectionProgramCommandLineParameters AND winlog.event_data.Details:-url hcp://services/centers/support?topic=%%s)) OR (winlog.event_data.Details:"http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/events.asp") OR (winlog.event_data.Details:"(Empty)"))))
